p: Among these 11 compounds tested, kingiside, gonocaryoside A, plumieride coumarate glucoside, and torvoside A were the most potent anti-trichomonal with MIC of 6.25 μM. Although these compounds were 125-fold less effective than metronidazole (MIC 0.05 μM), they were found to be safe and not toxic on Vero, KB, and MCF-7 cell lines at the concentrations tested.
